autopilot.prompt_locked: Please lock paddles before updating prompts!

subtitle.dead: We have no connection to the robot
subtitle.waiting: We have connection to Commander! Waiting for robot to be ready...
subtitle.init: Robot is initializing. Please make sure you have Controller put to Â·home position.
subtitle.active: Robot is ready! Use the left paddle to start recording when you are ready.
subtitle.stopped: Robot control is stopped, robot stays at current position
subtitle.fault: Robot is in unknown / faulty state, please use the support button.
subtitle.ap_inference: Robot is running inference...Use the Middle paddle to interrupt. Or right paddle to save if you think the data is good.
subtitle.ap_align: Robot stopped! Please move the Controller to match the robot.
subtitle.ap_align_ready: Controller is aligned to robot! Without moving the Controller, use the left paddle to take control.
subtitle.ap_ready: Robot is ready! Use the left paddle to start inference when you are ready.
subtitle.drag: Drag the robot back to home position! Then use the right paddle to resume collection.

gello.align_tip_home: Values indicate how far you are from the HOME position.
gello.align_tip_aligned: Values indicate how far you are from the ALIGNED position.
